edited_stories.edited_story_text: Last week I went to a work conference with my coworkers. The students who were involved seemed very enthusiastic and happy to be there. Later in the afternoon the whole family had the opportunity to gather for a group photo. Afterwards, he had the opportunity to give a speech to all of the students. After the presentation was over we had snacks. Everyone had a great time!
